PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04572022-04-29,  ,  IAIC,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing the Auditor General of Canada as the Auditor of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority
PrecisOrder (1) appointing the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as the AUDITOR OF THE WINDSOR-DETROIT BRIDGE AUTHORITY for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2022; and (2) requiring that the Auditor General of Canada prepare a report on the statement of Canadian contributions and statement of unrecouped Canadian contributions for the period ending on March 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
